name: Oniria: Lost World
description:
It's getting late and you are falling asleep. You wake up in a dream world and soon realizes you are not in your own dreams. You are on your little brother nightmares, and you are there to save him.

Find your little brother loved objects to save him!

UI Artist and Art Direction :Sara Gimeno Fernandez @sconsafos (twitter)
Game Programmer and Gameplay: Samuel Diaz Reyes @sasadire (twitter)
Visual artist and Graphic Dev : Paula Gabarron Martínez @pau.ntarelpan (instagram)
Music and SFx Designer: Jonatan Galindo Alvarez @jonatangameaud (twitter)
